gate.creole.ontology.ocat

Class OntologyViewerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.creole.ontology.ocat.OntologyViewerOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.event.DocumentListener, EventListener

    public class OntologyViewerOptions
extends Object
implements gate.event.DocumentListener
    Description: This class Provides options window to set the options for Ontology Viewer
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Niraj Aswani
